sentences.sContent: To his indignation, Charles found that his name was not on the list.
sentences.sCn: 查尔斯发现他的名字没有出现在名单上，这让他深感愤慨。

sentences.sContent: He stormed into her office, full of righteous indignation.
sentences.sCn: 他义愤填膺，气呼呼地冲进她的办公室。

trans.tranOther: feelings of anger and surprise because you feel insulted or unfairly treated
